kchandra423.graphics

Class DrawingSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • kchandra423.graphics.screens.DrawingSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class DrawingSurface
extends processing.core.PApplet
    Represents a drawing surface, which is a type of PApplet
    Author:
    Kumar Chandra
    See Also:
    PApplet

      • getKey

        public static boolean getKey(int keyCode)
        Returns whether or not a certain key is pressed
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The keycode of the given key to be checked
        Returns:
        Whether or not that key was pressed
        Precondition:
        keyCode must be less than 128
